name: The Air Transat Fleet - 2021 and Beyond
description:
Air Transat is a Canadian leisure airline that's one of only three passenger carriers to fly widebody aircraft.

However, they're not exactly doing that at the moment - so let's take a look at the Air Transat fleet in 2021!
